news.title: OpenAI DevDay reveals ChatGPT's 800M weekly users
news.body: During OpenAI's DevDay event, the company shared that ChatGPT now sees around 800 million weekly active users, underscoring the platform's rapid adoption and global reach【488309814389071†L224-L229】.

news.title: New AI tool launches from Meta, Amazon and Google
news.body: Recent conferences saw the introduction of Meta's DevMate, Amazon's Quick Suite and Google's Gemini Enterprise, signalling intensifying competition across generative AI tools【488309814389071†L230-L240】.

news.title: Anthropic unveils Claude Sonnet 4.5 and AI co‑creator trend
news.body: Anthropic released Claude Sonnet 4.5 and IBM updated its watsonx platform, while analysts noted a shift toward AI systems acting as creative collaborators rather than just assistants【488309814389071†L241-L246】.

jokes: Why did the AI take a break? It needed more 'training' data.
How does an AI throw a party? It uses a neural network to plan everything.
What do you call an AI's musical? "Les Misérables" because of all the misclassification loss.

shorts.title: AI Tool Highlights
shorts.description: A 60‑second roundup covering DevMate, Quick Suite, Gemini Enterprise and Claude Sonnet 4.5【488309814389071†L230-L240】【488309814389071†L241-L246】.

shorts.title: The Trust Paradox
shorts.description: Explains the paradox where people rely on AI yet also worry about losing control【488309814389071†L274-L282】.

videos.title: AI trust paradox explained
videos.description: An animated explainer on why the 'trust paradox' persists with AI adoption【488309814389071†L274-L282】.
